title: Adobe XP Support Patch x86 v0.8 Beta by PainteR [SadeemPC].zip
description:
Adobe XP Support Patch x86 v0.8 Beta by PainteR | 3.3 Mb

The patch implements all necessary functions required by Abobe Photoshop to run on Windows XP.


Supported features:
Core functions 
Improved Content-Aware Fill 
Improved Blur Gallery 
Shake Reduction 
and other new features.

HOW TO iNSTALL: 
Note: In the latest version of the application, some features might 
not be supported. However, it includes the improved features 
of previous versions. Choose functions you really need carefully. 
1.1 Install the required Adobe software using a ESD 
(Electronic Software Delivery) source. 
1.2 If the installation process fails (incompatible version), use 
the patch to enable the product setup on Windows XP. 
1.3 [Optionally] Use online updater to update the application or install 
the update manually: copy the updated files from the virtual machine.
2 Pick the installed application from the list and apply patch. 
3 Enjoy! 

HOW TO UNiNSTALL: 
[if BAK files exist] 
1 Select the product from the list. 
2 Click the "C" button and select the main executable file. 
3 You are done. 

SUPP0RTED APPLiCATiONS: 
Adobe Photoshop CC 2014.2.2 
Adobe Photoshop CC 2014.0 
Adobe Photoshop CC 14.2.1 
Adobe Photoshop CC 14.0 
Adobe Photoshop CS6 13.1.2
